text: Alberto Baillères González (22 August 1931 – 2 February 2022) was a Mexican billionaire businessman. Until his death, he had a net worth of US$10.1 billion. He was the chairman of Grupo BAL, and of ITAM since their founding in 1959. In October 2012, Baillères was listed as the 35th richest person in the world with a net worth of US $19.3 billion. Baillères died on 2 February 2022 in Mexico City, aged 90.Fallece Alberto Baillères, expresidente de Palacio de Hierro y Grupo Bal ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Mexican businesspeople Category:People from Mexico City
title: Alberto Baillères
